entry.title: The Cabin
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,511Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: At the beginning of the California winter, Stiles decided it would be best to get away from the conflicts and turmoil he was experiencing in the city—being part of the Hale Pack, for a human, was no easy feat. He decided to spend a few days alone in the cabin given to him by his boyfriend—and Alpha—Derek Hale. The entire land and surrounding area belonged to him. The small, beautiful cabin practically already belonged to Stiles. Derek had given it to his boyfriend as a gift, but he, or rather, they, hadn't moved in yet. "The cabin is our safe haven," Derek would say. Stiles was taken there with Derek, who, after a long session of kisses and hugs, was left alone to unwind. But his new friend, loneliness, wouldn't keep him company for long: Derek would return, at 11 p.m., to his cabin, to the arms of his beloved True Mate. He couldn't, and even less could he imagine, facing the whole night away from Stiles. Derek was coming back to him—to his kisses.

entry.title: [Podfic] Welcome To Beacon Hills
entry.summary:
Author: roseszain

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 197Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 51

Summary: "The new man also sported what was described as a perfect five o'clock shadow and a respectable haircut. Whoever this new man is, he certainly knows how to win a man's heart, he has me swooning and I haven't even seen him yet. Of course now I will have to fill out the proper paperwork to be allowed to swoon over a werewolf, but I think it will be worth it. Don't you?"“Oh ignore the radio,” the Sheriff said, “Stiles likes to show off.”“What the hell is a Stiles?” Derek asked, crossing his arms. entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,607Chapters: 18/19Kudos: 676

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: From Surrogate to Mate: Trust, Loyalty, and Love
entry.summary:
Author: Foxywho93

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,085Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 81

Summary: What started out as a surrogacy contract, turned into something more. A story about trust, loyalty, family, pack… and danger. Stiles Stilinski didn’t expect his life to collapse all at once — losing school, his apartment, even the Jeep that reminded him of his parents. Homeless, broke, and desperate, he walked into Woodland Grove Surrogacy Agency with nothing left to lose. He only wanted a chance to survive. Derek Hale came to the agency looking for someone strong enough to carry his pup. He didn’t expect his instincts to lock on the sarcastic, exhausted human with too-thin wrists and too-bright eyes. But his wolf knew immediately: Stiles was the one. Now Stiles is pulled into the Hale estate — into a world of warmth, loyalty, and pack — a world that insists he belongs even as he struggles to believe it. But whispers turn into threats, and danger follows close behind. Because sometimes fate doesn’t just hand you family. Sometimes it throws you into it claws-first.

entry.title: Pocket Lint
entry.summary:
Author: paintedrecs

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,116Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 183

Summary: Pretty much the only person who's never had Stiles wash his clothes is, frustratingly, the richest guy in the entire school. Derek S. Hale. Stiles figures the S stands for Stingy. Or maybe Scowl, since that seems to be his primary facial expression, especially around Stiles. He's gone through a lot of theories about why Hale won't let Stiles touch his clothes. *** "Let me get this right," Hale says, in a voice that’s frankly too soft for the fierce glare. "You want me to pay you to touch my clothes." "WASH them," Stiles says, making motions with his hands that’re meant to indicate the machine's churning cycle. Hale looks confused. "I'm not going to fondle them or anything," Stiles says, then clamps his mouth shut, because now Hale definitely thinks that’s the case.

entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 103,173Chapters: 20/37Kudos: 428

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't. He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating.No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that. What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser? Also known as 50/50 slice of life/teen wolf drama with a hearty dose of the Hales being a close knit family
